content: 7 7 8 8 9 sts 3 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2018 cut yarn leaving a long tail thread this tail through the remaining live stitches using your yarn needle taking the knitting needles out as you go and pull to close fasten_off and weave in both ends we love to see what you make tag your project on instagram using #makermakerstore maker maker store 151a lygon st brunswick east vic 3057 0435 220 761 www makermakerstore com info@makermakerstore com you can follow us here www ravelry com/shops/maker-maker www facebook com/makermakerstore @makermaker_store 4 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2018
